attributes.action: Create tier 0 “micro zones” e.g. a whole street being able to freely socialise
attributes.background: The government should create a tier 0 which is free of restrictions e.g a whole street allowed to freely socialise

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want the Government to reduce restrictions in certain areas, but it's not clear exactly how you want restrictions to be changed, or for what areas. We could accept a petition calling on the Government to exempt people living in certain areas from all Covid-19 restrictions, if that is what you want to happen, but you would need to be clear how you want this to work.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469
